link_desc:
This is a webhook script for sending notifications to Line messenger app.

Line messenger is a popular instant messaging app in Japan, Taiwan, Thailand, Indonesia, Cambodia and Turkmenistan.

This script is a modified version of the Telegram webhook script that comes with Zabbix.

* The name of the file and objects inside is misleading. The script does not use Line Notify but using Line Messaging API. If you're looking for the one using Line Notify, go to https://share.zabbix.com/zabbix-tools-and-utilities/cat-notifications/zabbix-line-notify

Instructions

1. Import the xml to Media types.

1. Create Message API channel on Line developer console https://developers.line.biz/en/services/messaging-api/

2. Issue a new long term token on Message API tab.

3. Put token on the token field.

4. Enable notification action on your Zabbix server.

================== Caution ======================================

Line Messaging API free plan limits usage to 1000 messages per month.

You may want to consider sending notifications via Line Notify which doesn't have this limit.

https://share.zabbix.com/zabbix-tools-and-utilities/cat-notifications/zabbix-line-notify
